# Simple Tagger Editor

**Edit tagger from auto generated caption one by one**

2024/2/25 by DKZ

![simple-tagger-editor](https://github.com/davidkingzyb/SimpleTaggerEditor/assets/6694635/354730ae-4c5e-4c58-a8a1-91acc078818c)

### How to use

1.input folder path
2.click load
3.select image
4.edit tagger
5.save
